title: Orphaned panel after closing several connections and reconnect again
author: igor2x
body_snippet: On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3208: 1. Set connections like this in two folders and several connections in each of folder. 2. In all connection from Project1 folder set Panel=Project1 and for each of connections in Project2 folder set Panel=Project2. 3. Right click on Project1 folder and Connect. 4. Right click on Project2 folder and Connect. 5. Now close down one by one...
